sheets.name: Units
sheets.description: description of what the sheet is

columns.description: The HP Value that the unit begins the battle with
columns.name: starting_hp

columns.description: Amount of mana that the unit begins the battle with
columns.name: starting_mana

columns.description: The amount of mana that the unit gains each turn if it does not perform an action.
columns.name: mana_growth

columns.description: Number of spaces a unit can move in a turn
columns.name: movement
presentation
columns.description: Data used for presentation of unit
Whether or not unit is a Commander
columns.name: is_commander

columns.description: if true, unit resists the effects of allegiance augments
columns.name: faithful
description
columns.description: Description that can be used in game to describe unit
FPS at which the unit's animations play
columns.name: animation_speed

columns.description: The maximum number of points that the commander can hold in their army
columns.name: point_limit

columns.description: Horizontal grid size for army builder
columns.name: grid_size_x

columns.description: Vertical grid size for army builder
columns.name: grid_size_y
army_augments
columns.description: augments to be applied to army

columns.name: enemy_army_augments
columns.description: augments to be applied to enemy army

sheets.name: Actions
sheets.description: Holds all the shared information for actions

columns.name: targeting_type
columns.description: Specifies the targeting strategy for the action
Specifies the targeting range for the action
columns.name: targeting_range

columns.description: Specifies the maximum number of targets for the action
columns.name: max_targets

columns.description: If set to 1 or greater, the action will trigger again, targeting all units within X spaces of the target.
columns.name: splash

columns.description: If set to true, the splash will trigger again on each splash target until no further targets remain. Splash will not apply to a single target more than once.
columns.name: chain

columns.description: Determines whether or not this is an action that can miss
columns.name: should_check_evasion

columns.description: A multiplier to determine how likely the attack is to hit. A value closer to 1 is more likely to hit
columns.name: evasion_multiplier

columns.description: Whether or not the action can crit
columns.name: can_crit

columns.description: The amount of mana that is added or subtracted from the actor's mana.  Should be positive for primary actions and negative for special actions.
columns.name: mana_delta

columns.description: Whether or not the action should break vanguard
columns.name: break_vanguard

columns.description: how long to wait for the action
columns.name: delay
action_type
columns.description: Which action script should this action inherit from
columns.options: DAMAGE_ACTION, HEAL, BASIC_AUGMENT_ACTION, MANA_ACTION, AUGMENT_ACTION, DISPEL_ACTION, TAG_ACTION, SUMMON_ACTION

columns.name: damage_action_props
columns.description: props for damage action, will be ignored on other action types

columns.name: heal_props
columns.description: Properties for Heal actions, ignored on other action types

columns.name: basic_augment_action_props
columns.description: Properties for BasicAugmentAction, can be ignored for other action types

lines.name: Disposit Strike
lines.description: Magic ranged attack that debuffs special defense

lines.name: Careful Study
lines.description: Accumulates mana to share with one's ward

columns.description: the amount by which each subsequent invocation is reduced (for splash/chain)
columns.name: decay

columns.description: whether or not the augment should reapply
columns.name: should_reapply

columns.description: should be true if action targets enemy units, false if action targets friendly units
columns.name: should_target_enemy

columns.description: Whether or not this Augment can be removed by abilities that remove augments
columns.name: undispellable

columns.description: f true, this augment (or another augment with the same unique_identifier) can not be reapplied to a target
columns.name: unique
unique_identifier
columns.description: Used to determine duplication when unique
If set to true, will allow a subsequent application to replace the remaining duration on an existing application, Only relevant when unique and durational are set to true
columns.name: replenishable

columns.description: Whether or not the augment expires after a certain duration
columns.name: durational

columns.description: The number of turns after which the augment will be removed if durational is true
columns.name: duration
augment_class
columns.description: Which class of augment this will create
columns.options: DOT, FLAT_STAT, STAT_MULT, ALLEGIANCE, TAG, DOOM

lines.name: Attendant's Devotion
lines.description: A mark of devotion from a loyal attendant.

lines.name: Vanishing
lines.description: An otherworldy bind, tethering an apparition to whence it came

columns.description: amount that phys defense should reduce damage tick
columns.name: phys_def_reduction_modifier

columns.description: amount that spec defense should reduce damage tick
columns.name: spec_def_reduction_modifier
resource
columns.description: which resource the augment applies to

columns.name: resolution_type
columns.description: at which phase the augment should apply

columns.name: stat
columns.description: which stat this augment applies to
columns.options: PHYSICAL_DEFENSE, SPECIAL_DEFENSE, SPEED, STRENGTH, INTELLIGENCE, LUCK, BRAVERY, MOVEMENT

columns.description: amount that stat should be modified by
columns.name: amount
stat
columns.options: PHYSICAL_DEFENSE, SPECIAL_DEFENSE, SPEED, STRENGTH, INTELLIGENCE, LUCK, BRAVERY, MOVEMENT

columns.description: the amount by which the stat is being multiplied
columns.name: multiplier
target
columns.options: PHYSICAL_DEFENSE, SPECIAL_DEFENSE, SPEED, STRENGTH, INTELLIGENCE, LUCK, BRAVERY, MOVEMENT, HEALTH, MANA, DAMAGE, ALLEGIANCE
